div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 545 Casolt (formerly Kastenholz), c. 12 km. (539) SE of Sibiu, Rumania, 1777 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: 100+ AR Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Ackner, Mitt. ZentralKomm 1862, pp. 135-6, note Gooss, AVSL 13 (1876), p. 229 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 66, no. 10
